    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes ProcessingInfo

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:ProcessingInfo

      • Description

        Transaction processing directives, including display currency overrides. If no display currency information is provided, the display and pricing currency will default to the value in POS/Source/@ISOCurrency.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers (Developer Notes) An agreement should be in place with your trading partners that specifies what information is summary versus detail.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ProcessingInfo displayCurrency="USD" positiveInteger="1234" summaryResultsInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "ProcessingInfo" : {
    "value" : null,
    "displayCurrency" : "USD",
    "positiveInteger" : 1234,
    "summaryResultsInd" : true
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        displayCurrency
        Preferred currencty code is a 3 char currency code as defined in ISO 4127
        Details
        Type CurrencyCode_ISO4217
        Example Value USD
        Required false
        Pattern [a-zA-Z]{3}
        Max Occurrences 1
        positiveInteger
        The maximum quantity of search results in the response.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        summaryResultsInd
        If true, summary information is requested in the search results.
